title: Portraits of Pride exhibit vandalized, days before closing
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Just days before the Portraits of Pride exhibit on the Boston Common was set to close, several of the photographs of LGBTQ leaders were slashed. With similar incidents targeting the LGBTQ community in recent months, we dive beneath the headlines and talk about what's going on.
